name: Fast-and-Fabulous Egg and Cottage Cheese Casserole
author: OLGA HUNT
summary: This is the easiest and best egg casserole I have tried so far. My sweet mother-in-law shared this recipe with me. I make 3 or 4 at the time and keep them in the freezer to take to gatherings, feed guests, or surprise kids. Green chilies make it pop!
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Prepare a 10x13-inch baking dish with cooking spray
Mix eggs, cottage cheese, Monterey Jack cheese, green chiles, butter, flour, bacon, and baking powder together in a large bowl; pour into prepared baking dish
Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes
Reduce heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) and continue baking until a toothpick inserted into the center of the casserole comes out clean, about 30 minutes more
